spatial_accuracy.notes: The alignment and room adjacencies are largely preserved, but there is noticeable dimensional stretching on the right-hand side. Room proportions for Bed Room 2 and Bed Room 3 have been elongated compared to the original floor plan.

structural_fidelity.notes: Major violation of constraints: the image is not a 3D isometric render but a tilted perspective or 'skewed' 2D image. Text labels and measurement lines from the original plan were not removed, violating the strict UI/Label constraint.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture exists but it is not clean block-style geometry; it is the 2D illustration from the source plan simply distorted into the new perspective. Scaling is inconsistent due to the wall stretching.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Total failure to meet 'low-poly 3D' style. The result is a 2D-to-2D skewing effect rather than a 3D model. No flat shading or volumetric lighting is present. The camera angle is not a true orthographic isometric view.

detected_errors.description: Strict violation: all text labels and measurement lines (e.g., 'LIVING 28'3"X23'6"') are still present.
Model is not a 3D isometric render; it is a 2D image projection with no actual wall height or depth.
Style violation: the texture and line work are identical to the 2D source instead of being converted to simplified low-poly geometry.
Layout distortion in the bedrooms on the right and stretching of the balcony areas.
